title: Course of Biostatistics
text:
Program

Descriptive statistics: frequency distribution, measures of location and variability, graphical representations
Introduction to inferential statistics
Introduction to suvival analysis



(Tentative) Schedule
The lessons will be held via Google Meet sessions according to the following calendar:

Tuesday, April 2, 15.30-18.00
Monday, April 8, 15.30-18.00
Monday, April 15, 15.30-18.00
Wednesday, April 17, 15.30-18.00
Monday, April 22, 15.30-18.00
Tuesday, April 30, 15.30-18.00
Monday, May 6, 15.30-18.00
Wednesday, May 8 15.30-18.00



Materials
Lecture 1: introduction: Tuesday, April 2
Lecture 2: frequency distributions: Tuesday, April 2
Lecture 3: graphical reprentations: Tuesday, April 2
Lecture 4: measures of location: Monday, April 8
Lecture 5: measures of variability: Monday, April 15
Lecture 6: bivariate data anaysis: Wednesday, April 17
Lecture 7: (A gentle) Introduction to probability theory and confidence intervals: Monday, April 22
Lecture 8: Statistical tests, Part 1: Tuesday, April 30
Lecture 9: Statistical tests, Part 2: Monday, May 6
Lecture 10: Introduction to survival analysis: Wednesday, May 8
